text: Elena Ceaușescu (; née Lenuța Petrescu; 7 January 1916 – 25 December 1989) was a Romanian communist politician. She was the wife of Nicolae Ceaușescu, General Secretary of the Romanian Communist Party and leader of the Socialist Republic of Romania. She was also the Deputy Prime Minister of Romania. She and her husband Nicolae were publicly executed by a firing squad on 25 December 1989. ==References== Category:1916 births Category:1989 deaths Category:First Ladies Category:Romanian communist politicians Category:People executed by firearm
title: Elena Ceaușescu
